articles.author: Jennifer Jett, Peter Nicholas
articles.title: Biden heads to Vietnam in latest push to counter China - NBC News
articles.description: President Joe Biden’s visit to Vietnam this weekend may be short, but it has major implications for American efforts to push back against China.
articles.content: Vietnam is also becoming an increasingly important destination for U.S. investment, especially as the U.S.-China trade war leads some American companies to relocate parts of their manufacturing opera… [+5827 chars]
